title.en: Color Fantasy Ferrybox data from Oslo-Kiel  (WIP)

description.en: Extraction of daily Ferrybox data from the Color Fantasy. Once every minute, the FerryBox system measures at a depth of four to seven metres along the fixed route of a vessel. This amounts to about one measurement every 500 metres.
